Class SiteImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.rmi.server.RemoteObject
      • java.rmi.server.RemoteServer
        • java.rmi.server.UnicastRemoteObject
          • fr.car.rmi.core.SiteImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    SiteItf, java.io.Serializable, java.rmi.Remote

    public class SiteImpl
extends java.rmi.server.UnicastRemoteObject
implements SiteItf, java.io.Serializable
    Server interface allow to send and receive a message from an RMI Object
    Author:
    Emeline SALOMON & Francois DUBIEZ
    See Also:
